subject: Business stay
message: Hi, we are group of people travelling on a business trip Bergen the end of the month. We are wondering if you can give us recommendations for stay combined with events? King regards, Dave

subject: Missing recipt
message: Hi, I booked a stay 5 days ago at Bergen Harbour hotel, but I have not received booking confirmation. Can please assist me with this?

subject: Cancellation
message: Hello, I have to cancel my booking due to a medical reason. I booked 4 nights at Quality Hotel Edvard Grieg from monday 14 of june  to june 18 2021. Kind regards, William

subject: Date changes
message: Hi all, I would like to change my booking check in from june 28 to the day after. June 29. Can you please condirm? MAny thanks, Michele.
